thread.title: Defender Jonathan Mensah delighted with injury returns of Ghana duo Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko
thread.title_full: Defender Jonathan Mensah delighted with injury returns of Ghana duo Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko

title: Defender Jonathan Mensah delighted with injury returns of Ghana duo Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 18:10 CET Defender Jonathan Mensah delighted with injury returns of Ghana duo Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko - www.ghanasoccernet.com Mensah happy with return of Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko 
Defender Jonathan Mensah is delighted to the return to full fitness of his Ghana teammates Kwadwo Asamoah and Jerry Akaminko. 
The Black Stars duo have been out of action for an extended period of time due to injury. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
